His responsibilities are as follows: The special master shall oversee the schedule for completion of discovery and all discovery disputes and motions related thereto pursuant to procedures for practice that the special master may establish and modify as necessary. The special master shall also conduct all settlement conferences at such time and manner as he deems appropriate. The parties may review the full proposed Order attached to this Text Order.
